Controller

Class CustomersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.CustomersController

  • public class CustomersController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to control the customers table in the database It has methods to add, remove, update, and load customers from the database It also has a method to check if a customer is available in the database If it is not available, it will add it to the database It also has a method to add a customer to the database

      • updateCustomer

        public static int updateCustomer(int CustomerID,
                                 java.lang.String customerName,
                                 java.lang.String address,
                                 java.lang.String postalCode,
                                 java.lang.String phone,
                                 java.lang.String division,
                                 java.lang.String Country)
        Updates the customer details in the database.
        Parameters:
        CustomerID - the ID of the customer to update
        customerName - the updated name of the customer
        address - the updated address of the customer
        postalCode - the updated postal code of the customer
        phone - the updated phone number of the customer
        division - the updated division of the customer
        Country - the updated country of the customer
        Returns:
        1 if the customer is updated successfully, 0 otherwise

      • addCustomer

        public static int addCustomer(java.lang.String customerName,
                              java.lang.String address,
                              java.lang.String postalCode,
                              java.lang.String phone,
                              java.lang.String division,
                              java.lang.String country)
        Adds a new customer to the database.
        Parameters:
        customerName - the name of the customer.
        address - the address of the customer.
        postalCode - the postal code of the customer.
        phone - the phone number of the customer.
        division - the name of the first-level division where the customer is located.
        country - the name of the country where the customer is located.
        Returns:
        1 if the customer was added successfully, 0 otherwise.
